entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then clearing. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 March 2023
